name: Letter To A Friend
storyline: Letter To A Friend is a short first person experience by Christoph Frey about the unspeakable horror that creeps up on you at a nightly train station.
summary: Letter To A Friend is a short first-person experience by Christoph Frey about the unspeakable horror that creeps up on you at a nightly train station. Its visual references come from expressionistic silent movies and old analog recordings. The game was made in 48 hours during Asylum Jam 2015 and is a proof of concept regarding the visual aesthetics and atmosphere.
